msg: . remove DemoControllerDispatcher (not necessary anymore because the SpringRESTController, a "real" implementation, is available now)
. rename SitemapParameters to avoid name collisions with Cocoon 2.2 (as explained by Daniel at http://cocoon.markmail.org/message/yxanav6afyzabcnf)
